statements: SELECT * FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE label='spam';
SELECT id, text_data FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE id=100;
SELECT label, text_data FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE text_data LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT id, label FROM MachineLearningTextClassification ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, label, text_data FROM MachineLearningTextClassification LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE label = 'spam'
SELECT text_data, label FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT label FROM MachineLearningTextClassification ORDER BY label ASC
SELECT id, text_data FROM MachineLearningTextClassification WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM MachineLearningTextClassification
SELECT * FROM training_data;
SELECT text, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 'positive';
SELECT id, text FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text FROM training_data WHERE label = 'negative' AND text LIKE '%good%';
SELECT id, label, text FROM training_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
SELECT text, label FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT id, text, label FROM training_data WHERE label = 'positive' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, label, UPPER(text) AS text_updated FROM training_data WHERE text LIKE '%machine%';
SELECT * FROM labeled_data;
SELECT id, text_data FROM labeled_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text_data, label FROM labeled_data WHERE label='positive';
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM ml_model WHERE model_type='classification';

SELECT id, text_data FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT id, text_data, features FROM training_data WHERE features @> '{"feature1": true}';

SELECT id, label FROM training_data WHERE label='negative';
SELECT id, text_data FROM labeled_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM model_performance WHERE metrics_name='accuracy' ORDER BY metrics_value DESC;
SELECT id, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name='learning_rate';

SELECT id, label FROM labeled_text_data ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT MAX(accuracy) AS max_accuracy FROM model_history;
